entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
